Sentencas: In this paper, the effects of defect interaction on the ionic conductivity of scandia-and yttria-doped zirconia are systematically investigated by density-functional-theory calculations and experimental verification.

Sentencas: Our calculated results show that the binding-energy variances of different defect configurations in scandia-doped zirconia are markedly lower than those in yttria-doped zirconia.
